message.entry: IMTOOL cannot display an {0} image.\nPlease see the help for allowed datatypes.
IMTOOL currently requires default XData and YData.\n{0}{1}
Image has an extreme aspect ratio. Displaying at 100%.

This image is too large to fit into memory. You can:

 * Create a reduced resolution dataset (R-Set) viewable in IMTOOL
 * Browse for an existing R-Set
 * Cancel
Cannot save or create this file. Make sure the disk you want to save the file on is not full or write-protected.
Open new Image Tool window for each export
Display the frame in Image Tool
Display pixel information for a region in the frame
